trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>evento para executar a inicialização personalizada do controle de edição quando uma célula entra em modo de edição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar as características de exibição do controle, defina as propriedades do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>propriedade em vez de definir as propriedades do controle retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> in which the user will edit the selected cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> na qual o usuário será editar o conteúdo da célula selecionada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> representing the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo da célula que está sendo editado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cell style of the edited cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de célula da célula editada.

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the CellStyle property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar as características de exibição do controle, defina as propriedades do objeto retornado pela propriedade CellStyle em vez de definir as propriedades do controle retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> representing the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo da célula que está sendo editado.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição dessa propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The control shown to the user for editing the selected cell's value.
trans-unit.target: O controle mostrado ao usuário para editar o valor da célula selecionada.

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the Control property.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar as características de exibição do controle, defina as propriedades do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>propriedade em vez de definir as propriedades do controle retornado pela propriedade de controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that displays an area for the user to enter or change the selected cell's value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que exibe uma área para o usuário inserir ou alterar o valor da célula selecionada.
